US equities (S&P 500) hover around 5,700, driven by tech/AI enthusiasm but pressured by rising bond yields (10Y Treasury ~4.2%). Geopolitical tensions (e.g., Middle East conflicts) add uncertainty, while Fed rate cut expectations (50% probability for December) support risk assets. Crypto and EVs show sentiment extremes.

**Recommended Actions**: Proceed with analysis but mandate cross-validation. Trigger data resurrection if sentiment flips post-trade.
